GSD.description:
ext4: check if directory block is within i_size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit ef6e69026d88aa7859f91d98b74fba62437efd67. For more details please see the references link.
